segments.text: I see the woman in the kitchen, her focus entirely on the plate she's drying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water from the sink is overflowing, pouring onto the floor in a continuous stream.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's surprising that she doesn’t seem to notice what's happening right at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but feel a bit anxious about the kids behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is climbing on that stool, which looks dangerously unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she knows how much chaos is brewing just out of sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful, a stark contrast to the turmoil inside.
segments.speaker: PAR
